ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen raspberry lemonade concentrate
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
des: "We came up with this recipe for my brother's wedding reception. We wanted to serve something that was easy and quick to fix, yet good at the same time. After a few tries, we ended up with this recipe...and a lot of compliments."
ins: In a large punch bowl, combine raspberry lemonade concentrate, water and lime juice. Stir in lemon-lime soda and crushed ice. Garnish each glass with a fresh raspberry and a mint leaf.
